changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `t_client` ( `F_ID` BIGINT(19) NOT NULL, `BIRTH_DATE` DATE NULL, `CELL_PHONE` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `FIRSTNAME` VARCHAR(255) NULL, `LASTNAME` VARCHAR(255) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`F_ID`));

changeSet.author: ohrem25032002@gmail.com
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `t_client_detail` ( `F_CLIENTID` BIGINT(19) NOT NULL, `CITY` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `COUNTRY` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `STATE` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `STREET` VARCHAR(255) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`F_CLIENTID`), CONSTRAINT `F_CLIENTID` FOREIGN KEY (`F_CLIENTID`) REFERENCES `t_client` (`F_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE);
